Question: How do I hide my iPhone screen while using VoiceOver?
Relevant Note: A three-finger triple tap toggles the Screen Curtain to darken the screen for privacy.

Question: Which Seeing AI channel identifies bank notes?
Relevant Note: The Currency channel in Seeing AI identifies bank notes from various countries.

Question: What JAWS shortcut lists all links on a page?
Relevant Note: In JAWS the command Insert + F7 brings up a list of all links on the current webpage.

Question: Which Seeing AI channel reads printed documents?
Relevant Note: The Document channel in Seeing AI requires you to take a photo and provides audio guidance to align edges.

Question: How do I stop JAWS speech immediately?
Relevant Note: To silence JAWS speech immediately press the Control key.

Question: What single key navigates by headings?
Relevant Note: The H key acts as the shortcut for Headings in most major screen readers (JAWS NVDA VoiceOver).

Question: Which app provides live video calls to sighted volunteers?
Relevant Note: Be My Eyes connects blind users to sighted volunteers via video call.

Question: What JAWS shortcut reads the current time?
Relevant Note: To read the current time in JAWS press Insert + F12.

Question: How do I type braille on an iPhone screen?
Relevant Note: Braille Screen Input on iOS allows you to calibrate dot positions based on where your fingers land.

Question: Which GPS app announces points of interest and intersections?
Relevant Note: BlindSquare is a GPS app that announces points of interest and intersections.

Question: What shortcut turns on Windows Magnifier?
Relevant Note: Windows Key + Plus turns on Magnifier and zooms in.

Question: Which Google Lookout mode scans grocery barcodes?
Relevant Note: Lookout's Food Label mode scans barcodes to identify packaged grocery items.

Question: What gesture opens the Android TalkBack menu?
Relevant Note: The TalkBack menu is accessed by a three-finger tap or an L-shaped gesture (swipe down then right).

Question: What app downloads books from the NLS?
Relevant Note: Bard Mobile allows users to download audiobooks from the NLS Braille and Audio Reading Download service.

Question: What JAWS shortcut switches open applications?
Relevant Note: To switch between open applications with JAWS speech support use Alt + Tab.

Question: What shortcut toggles VoiceOver on a Mac?
Relevant Note: Command + F5 toggles VoiceOver on macOS.

Question: Which Seeing AI channel identifies colors?
Relevant Note: The Color channel in Seeing AI identifies the color of the object in the center of the frame.

Question: What JAWS shortcut moves between table cells?
Relevant Note: Table navigation in JAWS uses Alt + Ctrl + Arrow Keys to move between cells.

Question: How do I scroll text on a braille display?
Relevant Note: Panning buttons are used to scroll the braille display to the next section of text.

Question: What is the shortcut to quit NVDA?
Relevant Note: To quit NVDA completely press NVDA + Q.
